subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manute Bol considers his height a gift from God, one that gave him a way out of his native Sudan and brought him fame and fortune in the N.B.A. Now he wants to give back.
snippet: Manute Bol considers his height a gift from God, one that gave him a way out of his native Sudan and brought him fame and fortune in the N.B.A. Now he wants to give back.
